sentences.en: A : Albert? Could you co - sign this approval sheet? Accounting's getting really picky.
sentences.cn: A: 阿尔伯特? 你能也在这份批准书签字 吗 ?财务部变得越来越严格了.

sentences.en: Albert? Could you co - sign this approval sheet? Accounting's getting really picky.
sentences.cn: 啊尔伯特? 你能也在这份批准书上签字 吗 ?财务部变得越来越严格了.

sentences.en: Don't be picky about food , eating more will be good for you.
sentences.cn: 吃饭不许挑食, 多吃点能长得胖胖的.

sentences.en: Everyone knows children are picky eaters.
sentences.cn: 众所周知，小孩子吃东西挑食。

sentences.en: He is always very picky about food.
sentences.cn: 他吃东西总是挑肥拣瘦.

sentences.en: I hate female bosses - - they are so picky.
sentences.cn: 我讨厌女性上司 -- 她们太会吹毛求疵.

sentences.en: It's a real hassle to get a picky child to eat.
sentences.cn: 为了让挑食的小孩吃东西,真是要费九牛二虎之力.

sentences.en: Most toddlers go through a period of picky eating.
sentences.cn: 大多数初学走路的婴儿都会经历一段挑食期.

sentences.en: On the other hand, female animals are much more picky.
sentences.cn: 另一方面, 雌性动物可就挑剔多了.

sentences.en: She is picky about what she eats because she is on a diet.
sentences.cn: 她正在节食,所以挑食挑得厉害.

sentences.en: She was surprised because my sister was very picky about what she would eat.
sentences.cn: 她很吃惊,因为我姐姐很挑食.

sentences.en: Some people are very picky about who they choose to share their lives with.
sentences.cn: 有些人对选择什么样的人共度一生非常挑剔。

sentences.en: Type AB : Type AB people are indecisive and picky.
sentences.cn: A型的人保守、被动,在意外表.

sentences.en: When men cook, they sure are picky about what ingredient they use.
sentences.cn: 当男人做饭时, 他们会精挑细选所用的原料.

words.tran_cn: 采摘；掘，撬开；采得物；赃物
挑选；采摘；挖；vt. 拾取；精选；采摘；掘；n. 选择；鹤嘴锄；挖；掩护

trans.tran_cn: 吹毛求疵的，好挑剔的，过分讲究的
trans.tran_en: someone who is picky only likes particular things and not others, and so is not easy to please
